name: Original Interview Case
description: Standard test case provided in the interview.

name: Simple Perfect Fit
description: 4 corners and 1 large filler that fills the rest exactly.

name: No Corners Available
description: Only 3 items of the same height. Should fail immediately.

name: Impossible Geometry (Too Long)
description: Area fits, but one box is longer than the pallet.

name: Impossible Area (Overflow)
description: Total box area exceeds pallet area.

name: Fragmentation Test
description: Many small items. Greedy often fails here; Backtracking should succeed.

name: Exact Row Fill
description: Boxes perfectly fill rows. Easy for humans, tricky for greedy if unsorted.

name: Mixed Heights
description: Valid corners exist, but many random heights distract the algo.
